subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: With two notable ascents, the time trial course may suit Andy Schleck, one of the world’s best climbers. But Evans has several advantages going into Saturday’s stage.
snippet: With two notable ascents, the time trial course may suit Andy Schleck, one of the world’s best climbers. But Evans has several advantages going into Saturday’s stage.
